snippet: The United States open and senior teams qualified for the quarterfinals, which started on Friday and will end on Saturday.
abstract: Phillip Alder Bridge column on deal played Second World Mind Sports Games in Lille, France.
lead_paragraph: The United States open and senior teams qualified for the quarterfinals, which started on Friday and will end on Saturday.
